title: Further Exclusions From the Federal Labor- Management Relations Program
summary: Executive Order 14343, issued on August 28, 2025, further excludes certain federal agencies and subdivisions from the Federal Labor-Management Relations Program to enhance national security. Key changes include adding units in the Bureau of Reclamation with primary responsibility for hydropower facilities, revising the list of excluded agencies under the Department of Commerce, and adding NASA and the U.S. Agency for Global Media to the list of excluded entities. The order also extends the deadline for certain exclusions issued by the Secretaries of Defense and Veterans Affairs. The order emphasizes that it does not create any enforceable rights or benefits and must be implemented consistent with applicable law and subject to available appropriations.
